post:
Hello!
[**ISPlevel**](https://isplevel.com/en/) - Ukrainian hosting provider with ssd vds on KVM.

We want to introduce our dedicated servers in Ukraine location:

CPU: **Intel Celeron G1610** | RAM: 4Gb | HDD: 1x500 = $45/month.
CPU: **Intel Core i5** | RAM: 8Gb | HDD: 2x500 = $55/month.
CPU: **Intel Core i7** | RAM: 16Gb | HDD: 2x500 = $65/month.

Traffic: 100mbit/s | Unmetered.
IPKVM: on request.
OS: Linux | Windows 
IPs: 1 IPv4 | 1 IPv6  (Additional 1 IPv4 - 2.5$/month)

When ordering a dedicated server, the **ISPmanager 5 Lite panel is free**!

We also provide **30% DISCOUNT** on all period for our **VDS** tariffs beginning with **VDS Level 2** in Ukraine and Russia. And when ordering a VDS service for a period of 1 year, get a registration of domain in the following domains: .com, .net, .info, .org, .ru for free. 
*All the tariffs except VDS Level 1 take part in the promotion and special gift.

**[VDS Level 2]** 
2 CPU Core 
2 Gb RAM 
15GB SSD 
100mbit bandwidth, unmetered.
7$\Month with promocode **autumn2018**

Locations: UA, RU 
Operating Systems: Linux
Billing panel: ISP BILLmanager 
VNC: Yes.

Payment Methods: 
Webmoney 
Visa / MasterCard (LiqPay) 
Bitcoin 
PerfectMoney 
Payeer 
Interkassa

**Promocode** for VDS: **autumn2018**

Our links: 
https://isplevel.com/en/ 
https://isplevel.com/en/dedicated.html
https://isplevel.com/en/vds.html

Useful links with Looking Glass:
https://isplevel.com/en/lg.html

Some additional information:

Q: Do you allow spam, botnet, phishing or any else fraud things on your servers?
A: No! We prefer to work without any illegally things and provide only "white" services to our clients and we react on abuses.

Q: Can we use VPN?
A: Yes, but only in personal porpuses. Public VPN's are not allowed.

Q: How can i install OS from my ISO?
A: We use VMmanager web-panel where user able to upload ISO with install files and setup the server by VNC service.

Also you can find other our services of vds and dedicated servers on our site! 
You are welcome!
